biography.bio: Kan'ichi Kurita was born on March 3, 1958 in Tokyo, Japan as Yoshiyuki Kurihara. He is an actor, known for Lupin III vs. Conan (2013), Lupin III: Farewell to Nostradamus (1995) and Lupin III - Mort ou vif (1996).
biography.name: Kan'ichi Kurita

biography.bio: Kiyoshi Kobayashi was born on January 11, 1933 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for The Castle of Cagliostro (1979), Lupin the 3rd (1977) and Daitokai - Tatakai no hibi (1976).
biography.name: Kiyoshi Kobayashi

biography.bio: Daisuke Namikawa was born on April 2, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Reservoir Chronicle: Tsubasa (2005), Hunter x Hunter (2011) and Freedom Project (2006).
biography.name: Daisuke Namikawa

biography.bio: Miyuki Sawashiro was born on June 2, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hunter x Hunter (2011), Tegamibachi (2009) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Miyuki Sawashiro

biography.bio: Yamadera is a famous Japanese voice artist and actor, born 17 June 1961 in Miyagi, Japan. A graduate from Tohoku Gakuin University's economics school, he is affiliated with Across Entertainment. Before that, he was affiliated with the Tokyo Actor's Consumer's Cooperative Society. He is very prolific voice artist that specializes in video games, television, animation theater and others. He was the manager of the Tagajo Senior High School basketball team before he started a voice over career. His voice-acting debut was the OVA Megazone 23 (1985) as the motorcycle-riding Shinji Nakagawa, while his television debut was the anime Bosco Adventure (1986) as the cowardly, but friendly Otter. Yamadera's break-out role as an voice artist was the anime Ranma 1/2 (1989), in which he played the dual role of Hibiki Ryoga and the Jusenkyo Guide. The same year, he voiced Shaman in giant robot anime TV series Granzort (1989). In 1991, Yamadera joined forces with Toshihiko Seki and Noriko Hidaka to form the acting unit Banana Fritters, which disbanded in 1995. On the October of 1997, Yamadera became a host on the TV Tokyo children's variety show Oha Suta. In 1994 Yamadera married Mika Kanai and they stayed married for twelve years until divorcing on the spring of 2006. Their divorce was revealed in 2007. Today, Kanai lives in 4-story house, while Yamadera lives in apartment in Tokyo. Yamadera is best known for his roles in Kaiketsu Zorori (Zorori), the Japanese dub of Full House (Joey Gladstone), Ranma 1/2 (Ryoga Hibiki/P-Chan, Jusenkyo Guide), Soreike! Anpanman (Cheese, Kabao, Kamameshidon), Brave Exkaiser (Osamu Tokuda),in highly popular Ghost in the Shell (1995)/Ghost in the Shell: Innocence (2004) (Togusa), Neon Genesis Evangelion (Ryoji Kaji), Cowboy Bebop (Spike Spiegel), the Yatterman remake (Narrator, Yatter-Wan, Odatebuta), Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack (Gyunei Guss), Paprika (2006) as Osanai Morio and in highly popular Vampire Hunter D - Bloodlust (2000) as Meier Link. He is also known for dubbing such actors as Jim Carrey and Eddie Murphy in foreign language films.
biography.name: Kôichi Yamadera

biography.bio: Marina Inoue was born on January 20, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Attack on Titan (2013), Kite Liberator (2007) and Blue Dragon (2006).
biography.name: Marina Inoue

biography.bio: Kôji Ishii was born on July 1, 1960 in Wakayama, Japan as Kozo Ishii. He is an actor, known for Black Heaven (1999), Pirate Squadron Gokaiger (2011) and El Hazard: The Magnificent World (1995).
biography.name: Kôji Ishii

biography.bio: Tadashi Miyazawa is an actor, known for Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000), Cosmo Warrior Zero (2001) and Monster Hunter 4 (2013).
biography.name: Tadashi Miyazawa

biography.bio: Ichirô Nagai was born on May 10, 1931 in Osaka, Japan. He was an actor, known for Lamu (1981), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Ninja Scroll (1993). He was married to Ayako. He died on January 27, 2014 in Hiroshima, Japan.
biography.name: Ichirô Nagai

biography.bio: Tadashi Nakamura was born on December 24, 1929 in Aichi, Japan. He is an actor and editor, known for Grave of the Fireflies (1988), Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012) and La traversée du temps (2006).
biography.name: Tadashi Nakamura

biography.bio: Ms. Pak is among the newer voice actors in the anime industry. She is of Korean descent and was born in Tokyo in 1972. Among her works is for the TV series Dejimon adobenchâ 02 (2000), in which she is the voice of Ken Ichijouji / Digimon Kaizer.
biography.name: Romi Pak

biography.bio: Yuka Terasaki was born on August 4, 1983 in Kumamoto, Japan. She is an actress, known for The Garden of Words (2013), Neko no shukai (2007) and Monster Hunter 4 (2013).
biography.name: Yuka Terasaki

biography.bio: Sora Tokui is an actress, known for Love Live!: School Idol Project (2013), Danchigai (2015) and JK meshi! (2015).
biography.name: Sora Tokui

biography.bio: Hiroshi Tsuchida was born on February 8, 1972 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ninja sentai Kakurenjâ (1994), Soulcalibur III (2005) and Super Sentai World (1994).
biography.name: Hiroshi Tsuchida
